channel.title: Washer on tgauweiler
channel.description: Recent content in Washer on tgauweiler

item.title: WasherRepair
item.description: Introduction The old miele hydromatic W701 washer was acting up and not spinning its barrel. Opening & Repair First i had to remove some screws to swing the front part open with a litte force. Next came the removing of all screws that hold the motor cables in place. At this part i checked the resitance with my multimeter between the left and right coals. (Measured at the litte open flat pieces left and right) and got infite resistance.
